title: Installation issue: py-matplotlib
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

spack install -j16 py-matplotlib

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install <spec>
...
/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -fPIC -DPY_ARRAY_UNIQUE_SYMBOL=MPL_matplotlib__path_ARRAY_API -DNPY_NO_DEPRECATED_API=NPY_1_7_API_VERSION -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1 -Iextern/agg24-svn/include -I/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/py-numpy-1.19.4-2bhftgmawvw5yfra4oofsryhn6zkmypo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/python-3.7.8-bjzum7plgrilh2k4xk35qu5fxchrvm5s/include/python3.7m -c extern/agg24-svn/src/agg_vcge
     630    /lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -fPIC -DPY_ARRAY_UNIQUE_SYMBOL=MPL_matplotlib__path_ARRAY_API -DNPY_NO_DEP
            RECATED_API=NPY_1_7_API_VERSION -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1 -Iextern/agg24-svn/include -I/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/py-numpy-1.19.4-2bhftgmawvw5yfra4oo
            RECATED_API=NPY_1_7_API_VERSION -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1 -Iextern/agg24-svn/include -I/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/py-numpy-1.19.4-2bhftgmawvw5yfra4oo
     632    /usr/lib64/distcc/g++ -pthread -shared build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/src/py_converters.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/src/_path_wrapper.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/exte
            rn/agg24-svn/src/agg_bezier_arc.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/extern/agg24-svn/src/agg_curves.o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/extern/agg24-svn/src/agg_image_filters.o bu
            tator.o -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/python-3.7.8-bjzum7plgrilh2k4xk35qu5fxchrvm5s/lib -lpython3.7m -o build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/matplotlib/_path.c
            python-37m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so
     633    building 'matplotlib._qhull' extension
     634    /lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -fPIC -DMPL_DEVNULL=/dev/null -DPY_ARRAY_UNIQUE_SYMBOL=MPL_matplotlib__qhu
            ll_ARRAY_API -DNPY_NO_DEPRECATED_API=NPY_1_7_API_VERSION -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1 -I/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/py-numpy-1.19.4-2bhftgmawvw5yfra4oofs
            ryhn6zkmypo/lib/python3.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/python-3.7.8-bjzum7plgrilh2k4xk35qu5fxchrvm5s/include/python
            3.7m -c src/qhull_wrap.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/src/qhull_wrap.o -fvisibility=hidden -flto
     635    /usr/lib64/distcc/gcc -pthread -shared -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/gettext-0.21-zezkketvjdhsptk2zvgjdltuizzppwst/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-bro
            adwell/gcc-10.2.0/readline-8.0-2yrtmmu5ohqmexpwtujperhu4kc7grrj/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/ncurses-6.2-jxmhn424fjw2jabjpwsthn33ft63zpxt/lib -L
            /opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/openssl-1.1.1h-7yhnwuqjvrn6u5l4q33orij6vlhxly6t/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/sqlite-3.33.0-ybpx3ea
            2krr5j32vqbz7jdvonhhfa4gy/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/gdbm-1.18.1-ngrlf3xgy7rfdmw4ej4mauosm3oksoc6/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc
            -10.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-u2xnbctnh2v2k4rsho6pbkfilw4ztyvq/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/bzip2-1.0.8-o5rfrqj5l2mjamylxp2scoq5x3qyytvr/lib -L/opt/spack/
            linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/xz-5.2.5-pfe3f3kb4mymzebz2g7gjql2xb3gb4ux/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/expat-2.2.10-rnd6w7m4ik7i4rxzk7oytn442
            f5ewha6/lib -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/libffi-3.3-cqm5mpwjtyqkyrmpi6j3xaghbnfwgdxn/lib64 -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/libuuid-1
            .0.3-ijlg3p53xuxl2hbpb2vmwcwfaf7jgwvo/lib build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/src/qhull_wrap.o -L/opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/python-3.7.8-bjzum7plgrilh2k4xk3
            5qu5fxchrvm5s/lib -lqhull -lpython3.7m -o build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/matplotlib/_qhull.cpython-37m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so
  >> 636    /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lqhull
  >> 637    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
     638    distcc[30002] ERROR: compile (null) on localhost failed
  >> 639    error: command '/usr/lib64/distcc/gcc' failed with exit status 1

```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.15.4
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-mageia8-skylake
<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()
* [spack-build-env.txt]()

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

@adamjstewart 

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [ X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
